title: Car Seat Leather
description: Newer vehicles come equipped with airbags within the seats, requiring precise, manufacturer-compliant stitching for safety. Our computer-controlled sewing machines ensure certified and reliable airbag deployment, maintaining your vehicle’s safety standards.

title: Car Leather Floor Mat
description: One of the most common issues is the toughness in cleaning the car interior maybe due to liquid drops or biscuits crumbs from eating inside the car which can make the cabin unhygienic. By installing Car Leather floor mat, this is a cost-effective solution that can often be completed while you wait. Pre-made carpet kits that we can professionally fit. Hand-made carpets tailored specifically to your vehicle for a perfect fit.
description2: What makes our car leather floor mat an excellent choice for you? Our Car leather floor mat is Waterproof, its easy to clean and you don’t have to worries for bad odors smell. The material we provide is a good quality which have a good durability and resistance towards tear / damaged leather.

title: Car Body Cover
description: Our car body cover helps in covering your car from dust and wind, also our material is water proof. so you don’t have to worry about your car getting dust / mould in the long run!
